content: Spend half a day — or even a full day — taking in the immersive, multi-sensory experience at teamLab Planets
Download the teamLab and teamLab: FIRE apps to interact with the artworks in teamLab Planets!
Explore teamLab Planets' 10 immersive art installations, designed to stimulate all five senses
Experience teamLab Planets' newest installations, including the art-filled dining spaces of Vegan Ramen UZU Tokyo
Enjoy seasonal attractions at teamLab Planets: cherry blossoms at Drawing on the Water Surface in spring, and more
